org.team751.utils

Class PolyMotorRobotDrive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team751.utils.PolyMotorRobotDrive

  • public class PolyMotorRobotDrive
extends Object
    A RobotDrive that works with any number of motors. When this class accesses a speed controller, it is synchronized. This allows it to safely be used when other threads are also accessing them.
    Author:
    Sam Crow

    • Method Detail

      • arcadeDrive

        public void arcadeDrive(double moveValue,
               double rotateValue)
        Drive the robot with arcade drive
        Parameters:
        moveValue - The degree to which the robot should turn left or right. Full left is -1, full right is +1.
        rotateValue - The degree to which the robot should be moved forward/back. Full forward is +1, full reverse is -1
